empty_magazine.title: Empty Magazine
empty_magazine.description: fire 1 shot forward that shuffle on kill, 10 damage.

ricochet_fire.title: Ricochet Fire
ricochet_fire.description: fire 2 lanes of bullets that bounce off walls, 3 damage.

double_tap.title: Double Tap
double_tap.description: fire 2 shots in quick succession, 5 damage.

underflow.title: Underflow
underflow.description: when played, if this is the last card in your deck, instantly shuffle the deck.

blanket_fire.title: Blanket Fire
blanket_fire.description: shoot 3 lanes of 20 bullets from behind you, 1 damage.

perfected_fire.title: Perfected Fire
perfected_fire.description: fire 2 bullets, fire an extra 2 bullets for each card with "fire" in the name in the deck, 1 damage.

relentless_assault.title: Relentless assault
relentless_assault.description: lose all reinforce, fire (reinforce lost) x 2 random shots forward.

flare.title: Flare
flare.description: fire 1 shot that aplies flame on hit, gain 1 heat, 5 damage.

flame_thrower.title: Flame Thrower
flame_thrower.description: shoot a spray of flames that apply flame on hit, 1 damage.

explosion_shower.title: Explosion Shower
explosion_shower.description: fire 3 bombs that explode after 2 seconds, 10 damage.

nuclear_fusion.title: Nuclear Fusion
nuclear_fusion.description: fire an expanding circle of explosions.

carpet_bombing.title: Carpet Bombing
carpet_bombing.description: fire a row of explosives that travels forward.

overclock.title: Overclock
overclock.description: gain 3 heat, add a backfire to the deck.

flame_burst.title: Flame Burst
flame_burst.description: fire a short range flame wave.

unload_heat.title: Unload Heat
unload_heat.description: spend 2 heat, apply flame for 2 seconds to all enemies.

rewire.title: Rewire
rewire.description: gain 1 impede, gain generation boost for 2 seconds.

fan_shot.title: Fan Shot
fan_shot.description: fire 20 bullets in a fan shape, 2 damage.

point_blank.title: Point Blank
point_blank.description: fire a powerful short range burst.

bouncy_shells.title: Bouncy Shells
bouncy_shells.description: fire 2 bursts diagonally that bounce off walls.

reckless_fire.title: Reckless Fire
reckless_fire.description: fire a long range burst, 20% chance to add backfire to the deck.

last_stand.title: Last Stand
last_stand.description: gain infinite energy for 10 seconds, die in 10 seconds if the combat is not won.

take_aim.title: Take Aim
take_aim.description: fire 8 shots aimed at the closest enemy, 2 damage.

cover_fire.title: Cover Fire
cover_fire.description: fire 10 randomly aimed shielded bullets, damage 4.

force_field.title: Force Field
force_field.description: make a shield that lasts 2 seconds.

static_discharge.title: Static Discharge
static_discharge.description: Lose all charge on self, deal damage equal to 2*(charge lost) to all enemies.

stasis.title: Stasis
stasis.description: gain a shield for 8 seconds, can't move for 8 seconds.

shield_throw.title: Shield Throw
shield_throw.description: lose all endurance, fire a shot that deals Y*(stacks lost) damage.

field_strip.title: Field Strip
field_strip.description: remove 2 random junk cards from the deck.

laser_sweep.title: Laser Sweep
laser_sweep.description: fire 2 lasers that sweep over a large area, 5 damage.

blast_store.title: Blast Store
blast_store.description: add a blast to your deck.

random_access_memory.title: Random Access Memory
random_access_memory.description: add a random card seen this run to the deck.

photosynthesis.title: Photosynthesis
photosynthesis.description: add 2 blasts to your deck, heal 1 hp, exhaust.

barrel_roll.title: Barrel Roll
barrel_roll.description: makes the evade chance of dodge 100% for 2 seconds.

reused_assets.title: Reused Assets
reused_assets.description: add a random card played this combat to the deck.

violet_detector.title: Violet Detector
violet_detector.description: summon a turret that fire at closest target.

helper_turret.title: Helper Turret
helper_turret.description: summon 2 helper turrets next to you.

jammed_fire.title: Jammed Fire
jammed_fire.description: Fire 5 shots, 50% chance to add a jam to the deck instead of firing, 20 damage.

blank_round.title: Blank Round
blank_round.description: fire a short range shot, exhaust.

backfire.title: Backfire
backfire.description: 50% chance to take 1 damage (can't be lethal), exhaust.

blue_capsule.title: Blue Capsule, Bloodlust
blue_capsule.description: gain 1 reinforce whenever an enemy dies

orange_capsule.title: Orange Capsule, Arson
orange_capsule.description: whenever flame is applied apply 1 fragile

red_capsule.title: Red Capsule, Shared Pain
red_capsule.description: whenever you gain a debuff deal 2 damage to all enemies

green_capsule.title: Green Capsule, Second Wind
green_capsule.description: endure a fatal hit and heal 2 hp, gain full energy

yellow_capsule.title: Yellow Capsule, Stored Energy
yellow_capsule.description: whenever a card is created restore 0.5 energy

violet_capsule.title: Violet Capsule, Mercenary Turrets
violet_capsule.description: at the start of battle lose 2 scrap and summone 2 helper turrets

dramatic_entrance.title: Dramatic Entrance
dramatic_entrance.description: deal 5 damage to all enemies at the start of combat
